basics.name: Darío Nicolás Tamburello
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with a strong focus on JavaScript and TypeScript ecosystems, working across React and Node.js-based systems. Product-oriented engineer with solid backend ownership, experience building and maintaining production systems, and a strong background in infrastructure that informs architectural and scalability decisions. Comfortable working in remote, English-speaking environments and collaborating closely with product and design teams.

work_experience.name: Current Company (Confidential)
tasks: Develop and maintain backend services and APIs, focusing on reliability, maintainability, and production stability.
Implement features based on defined requirements, debugging and resolving complex issues across the stack.
Collaborate asynchronously with distributed teams in a remote environment.
Work extensively with existing codebases, improving structure, performance, and long-term maintainability.

work_experience.name: Plum
tasks: Developed and maintained large-scale e-commerce platforms for a North American company using .NET and JavaScript-based frontends.
Focused on frontend development, improving UX/UI across desktop and mobile experiences.
Implemented backend and back-office features, including third-party API integrations (payments, shipping, and internal systems).
Worked fully in English, participating in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and direct communication with US-based stakeholders.
Collaborated within an agile Scrum environment, maintaining high code quality standards through peer reviews.

work_experience.name: Eling S.A.
tasks: Worked across infrastructure and application layers, managing Linux and Windows servers, databases, and containerized environments.
Developed internal monitoring and tooling applications using Node.js and React to support operational needs.
Participated in requirement analysis and coordination with development teams for internal systems.

testing: Manual testing and debugging in production environments
